overview: Azariel, a non-binary teenager addicted to his cell phone, prefers to build his image through social networks and talk with people he meets online, than with his male classmates at the school he attends. Lately that seems to even include his best friend Gabriel. After watching a fight between the boys of the school basketball team, their aggressiveness catches his attention, in particular Rafael and An√≠bal, the two most violent members of the team. The relationship with Gabriel becomes colder and more distant when Azariel begins to relate to the players. Gabriel is suspicious of them and disapproves of Azariel's new interests.
title: Adolescencia violenta
